title: Tap Counter For Android Wear
summary: Counting made easy with Tap Counter For Android Wear.

description: Simply touch the blue button to increment the counter. Long press will reset the counter. This app is very simple and easy to use and a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start Tap Counter.Get more apps, games & news about Android Wear with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxsPlease note:-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Tap Counter" or say "Start Tap Counter"Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
descriptionHTML:
Simply touch the blue button to increment the counter. Long press will reset the counter. This app is very simple and easy to use and a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start Tap Counter.


Get more apps, games & news about Android Wear with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Tap Counter" or say "Start Tap Counter"


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
comments: Disappointed it can't do all-day counting. App stays on constantly while counting. When you return to watch face, counter starts at zero when reopening
Perfect counter No need to fumble with your phone to keep count when your running laps on a track.
Difficult to swipe away, very small hitbox for exiting. Other then that, great.
Simple and great Perfect for what I do. Thanks for coming up with this for wear.
Wonderful Perfect solution for counting rows with knitting and crochet.

Nice little counter but it only works on the foreground. If like to count things during the day and as soon as you return to the home screen, the counter resets. It would allow more tours of counting if the count persisted
